title: Tech, megacap growth shares boost Wall Street; Twitter surges - Moneycontrol
content: Tech, megacap growth shares boost Wall Street; Twitter surges  Moneycontrol
description: Shares of Twitter surged 27.1% after Tesla Inc Chief Executive Musk revealed a 9.2% stake in the micro-blogging site, making him its largest shareholder. Shares of other social media companies also rose.
